body:
Comment 8 by **tarmigan**: 
For what it's worth, it panics after a different number of cycles each time:
743
252
492
962
254
265
227
442
1487
299
1274
637

Also, with this test program, I have only seen the "malloc/free - deadlock" panic so far
(20+ panics) and not the "split stack overflow" that I also see with my real program.
